attributes.action: Give British Born Citizens priority over immigrants.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Giving Priority over housing, benifits, Employment. Stopping Immagration and paying for immigrants is taking its toll on Britain and us as citizens, young people will never have a pension and we can't find accomodation (Council or Buying) Cost of living is through the roof. 
As it stands it seems after our familys working their whole lives to give us a better life, we seem to be at the bottom of the goverments list of prioritys.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
False or incomplete name or address information
